de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.evaluation.classification.holdout

Class TrainingAndTestSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.evaluation.classification.holdout.TrainingAndTestSet

  • public class TrainingAndTestSet
extends Object
    Wrapper to hold a pair of training and test data sets. The labels of both training and test set are provided in labels.
    Author:
    Arthur Zimek

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ArrayList<ClassLabel> labels
      The overall labels.
      private MultipleObjectsBundle test
      The test data.
      private MultipleObjectsBundle training
      The training data.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      TrainingAndTestSet(MultipleObjectsBundle training, MultipleObjectsBundle test, ArrayList<ClassLabel> labels)
      Provides a pair of training and test data sets out of the given two databases.
